text:
Yes. at the end of the the episode ‘all things’ we get visual confirmation: Scully falls asleep in Mulder’s couch fully dressed, he is also fully dressed. But the beginning of the episode Scully is dressing again with the same clothes she fell asleep in and her jacket was on Mulder’s bed and he is sleeping on his bed naked. For a show that always tries to be ‘tasteful’ about sex scenes this is almost the ‘money shot’

Now most fans, including myself, think they started to have sex after the kiss in Millennium and ‘all things’ is merely the episode where ‘William’ might had been conceived or/and the episode where Scully accepts that she was meant to be with Mulder but that is more up for debate. Hope that helps!
title: The X-Files (TV series): Did Mulder and Scully ever have sex?
